Changes.LogName: Event One - What's Up With Alex

Entries.955801/f Alex 500/f Jeric 500/t 900 1700: springtown/26 23/farmer -100 -100 1 Alex 27 22 3 Haley 26 22 1 Jeric 20 30 0/skippable/move Jeric 2 0 0/move Jeric 0 -5 0/faceDirection Haley 2/speak Haley "Oh, hey Jeric!$h"/pause 200/emote Jeric 32/pause 200/move Jeric 0 -3 1/move Jeric 2 0 1/faceDirection Haley 3/speak Jeric "Hey there! You're both lookin' good today.$7"/emote Haley 56/pause 200/speak Haley "Thank you! You're not looking too bad yourself!$h"/pause 200/emote Alex 40/pause 200/speak Alex "Uh, yeah... Thanks. I've upped the reps on my bicep curls lately."/pause 500/speak Jeric "I can tell! You've got that sculpted look going on.$h#$b#Hey, you should talk to Philip some time. He's really super-powered my workouts.#$b#He could set you up with a leg day routine!$h"/pause 300/emote Alex 8/pause 300/speak Jeric "Never neglect those glutes, right?#$b#Seriously, there's a great gym at the hotel. Maybe I'll see you there?$7"/pause 500/speak Alex "Uhhh, right. Maybe.$l"/pause 500/speak Jeric "Haley, did you do something different with your hair? It looks great.$h"/pause 300/emote Alex 12/pause 300/speak Alex "That's it! Stop flirting with my girl!$a"/pause 300/emote Jeric 8/pause 300/faceDirection Haley 1/speak Haley "Ugh, Alex, I'm not YOUR girl. You were the one who wanted a break!$a"/pause 600/speak Jeric "Yeah, I'm sorry if you got the wrong idea or something..."/pause 400/emote Alex 12/pause 400/speak Alex "Yeah, well...$a#$b#Never mind.$s"/pause 400/speed Alex 4/advancedMove Alex false 13 0 0 14/pause 300/faceDirection Haley 3/pause 300/emote Haley 28/pause 300/speak Haley "Ugh, what's with him lately? Whatever.$a#$b#Sorry about that."/pause 600/warp Alex -100 -100/speak Jeric "Hey, no problem.#$b#Sorry if I was too forward, I didn't mean anything by it.$s"/pause 600/speak Haley "No, don't worry! You were just complimenting me!#$b#It's nice to have someone around here who appreciates my style.$h"/pause 400/globalfade/viewport -1000 -1000 true/message "That's strange... is Alex okay?"/pause 500/addConversationTopic AlexJeric1/end

Entries.955802/e 955801/p Alex: none/13 5/farmer 10 10 0 Alex 14 5 2/skippable/pause 1000/doAction 10 9/move farmer 0 -4 1/emote Alex 12/move farmer 3 0 0/pause 500/emote farmer 8/textAboveHead Alex "Ugh!"/pause 500/speak Alex "What do you want?$a"/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 500/question null "#Wow, rude.#Are you okay?"/pause 500/speak Alex "I'm sorry...$s"/pause 500/textAboveHead Alex "sigh..."/pause 500/speak Alex "I guess you saw that whole thing with Jeric and Haley.$s#$b#I don't know why I acted like that. Haley's right, I don't have any right to get mad because she's talking to some hot guy.$s"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/playMusic desolate/speak Alex "We've had this whole on-again off-again thing going on since we were in high school, but it never works out.$s#$b#We always find some reason to break up, then we end up getting back together because it feels like we ought to.$s#$b#The cheerleader and the jock, y'know?#$b#But it feels like I'm living someone else's story. I'm not even usually that sad when it ends.$s#$b#But it's different now she's started hanging out with Jeric.$a"/stopMusic/question fork1 "#Alex, do you think you might be into Jeric?#...okay. Well, it was nice talking to you."/fork wellokaythen1/pause 200/jump Alex/pause 200/speak Alex "Wait, what? Is this because I said he was hot? That doesn't mean anything!$a#$b#So what if he's hot? Ugh, now I'm confused and it's your fault...$a"/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 200/speak Alex "...*sigh*$s#$b#Okay, yeah. He's hot."/pause 200/emote farmer 56/addConversationTopic AlexJeric2 10/pause 1000/end
Entries.wellokaythen1: pause 500/speak Alex "Wow, yeah, that was a lot, right?#$b#I've never told anyone that stuff before. I've never even really thought about it.#$b#Thanks for letting me vent, @! I feel a lot better.$h"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/addConversationTopic AlexJeric3 10/pause 1000/end

Entries.955803/e 955802/t 900 1800/f Jeric 1000/: distantBanjo/11 11/farmer 8 14 0 Alex -100 -100 0 Jeric -100 -100 0 Ysabelle -100 -100 0 Philip -100 -100 0/skippable/move farmer 0 -4 1/move farmer 3 0 0/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 400/emote farmer 8/pause 400/message "Where is everyone?"/pause 300/move farmer 10 0 0/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation Custom_Ridgeside_LogCabinHotel3rdFloor/warp farmer 12 15/warp Alex 18 7/warp Jeric 22 7/warp Philip 23 7/warp Ysabelle 21 10/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Alex 2/faceDirection Jeric 2/faceDirection Philip 3/faceDirection Ysabelle 0/viewport 17 9/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 5 0 1/speak Philip "I told you not to lock out your knees!$3"/pause 400/speak Jeric "Yeah, I know... owww.$s"/move farmer 0 -3 1/emote farmer 8/pause 200/faceDirection Ysabelle 3/pause 200/speak Ysabelle "These two idiots decided it would be a good idea to have a deadlift competition."/pause 500/speak Alex "Hey! It was Jeric's idea!$a"/pause 500/speak Ysabelle "And you agreed to it, so you're just as ridiculous!$h"/pause 500/move Jeric -3 0 3/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Jeric "Well fought! I concede. Which means I owe you a drink.$h#$b#Saturday night at Pika's? He makes a mean protein shake.$7"/pause 500/speak Alex "Cool.$l"/pause 500/speak Jeric "Nice! See you there."/pause 400/advancedMove Jeric false 0 6 -7 0 0 2/pause 300/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 300/textAboveHead Jeric "ouch..."/pause 300/emote Philip 28/pause 3000/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "...did he just ask me on a date?"/warp Jeric -100 -100/speak Philip "I... think so?$h"/pause 500/speak Alex "Oh. Cool.$l"/pause 500/speak Ysabelle "Well, as entertaining as this has been, I need to get back to my desk before Grandfather realises I've been slacking off."/pause 500/speak Philip "Yeah, I should get going too. Keep working on your form, okay Alex? And @, look after yourself!"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/addConversationTopic AlexJeric4/end

Entries.955804/e 955803/t 1800 2200/d Mon Tue We: playful/94 40/farmer -100 -100 0 Alex 94 41 3 Jeric 90 40 0 Faye 90 38 2 Pika 94 37 0 Corine 87 47 1 Paula 89 45 2 Anton 89 48 0/pause 1000/speak Jeric "Two Cherry Berry Shakeys, please!"/pause 500/speak Faye "Coming right up! Corine or I will bring it over for you in a minute."/pause 300/emote Jeric 32/pause 300/move Jeric 0 1 2/move Jeric 3 0 1/speak Alex "Wait, did you pay for both of us?$h"/pause 500/speak Jeric "What can I say? I pull out all the stops for my dates.$7"/pause 500/speak Alex "So... this is definitely a date.$h"/pause 500/speak Jeric "Yeah! Wait... you couldn't tell I was hitting on you?"/pause 500/speak Alex "I hoped so, but you're flirty with everyone.#$b#The negging was a pretty big clue, though!"/pause 500/speak Jeric "Ouch! Called out by the guy who only goes to the Flower Dance to 'check out the scenery'? You wound me!$h"/pause 500/speak Alex "Oh. Yeah. That reminds me... how's the hamstring?$s"/pause 500/speak Jeric "Still sore but the doc reckons it'll be fine.$h#$b#Phillip's still giving me grief about it though..."/pause 500/speak Alex "That's what you get for taking on the champ!$h"/pause 500/message "The date seems to be going well! I should probably stop spying on them now..."/pause 1000/addMailReceived AlexJericDating/addConversationTopic AlexJeric5/end

Entries.955805/e 955804/w sunny/t 1000 1800/d Mo: jaunty/53 70/farmer -100 -100 0 Alex 52 71 0 Jeric 49 64 2/skippable/specificTemporarySprite joshDog/move Jeric 0 7 1/move Jeric 2 0 1/pause 300/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 300/animate Alex true true 3000 42 42/showFrame Jeric 42 flip/positionOffset Jeric 12 0/positionOffset Alex -12 0/playSound dwop/specificTemporarySprite heart 52 69/pause 1000/positionOffset Alex 12 0/positionOffset Jeric -12 0/stopAnimation Alex/showFrame Alex 12/showFrame Jeric 4/pause 500/speak Jeric "Hey babe. How's it going?$7"/pause 600/speak Alex "Not bad.$h"/pause 600/faceDirection Jeric 0/speak Jeric "And how's Dusty?"/pause 500/playSound dogWhining/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 0/speak Alex "He's doing pretty good. He may be old but he still knows a few tricks!$h#$b#Man, I used to spend so much time training him when I was a kid. All the normal stuff like sit, speak -"/pause 300/playSound dog_bark/pause 300/speak Alex "- and I even taught him how to shake hands and jump through Haley's hula hoop!"/pause 500/emote Jeric 32/pause 500/speak Alex "Funny story about that, actually.#$b#So back when I was about ten, I found this flyer for a dog show. I thought, hey! I should take Dusty!#$b#So the next weekend I borrowed that hula hoop, spent all my allowance on a bus ticket and took him to Grampleton.#$b#But when I got to the show, this snooty old woman looked down her nose at me and asked what breed he was...#$b#Turns out it was a show for fancy pedigree dogs and I was too stupid to figure it out!$h#$b#I ended up crying the whole way home...$s#$b#Ridiculous, right?"/pause 500/emote Jeric 16/pause 500/faceDirection Jeric 1/speak Jeric "That's not funny. And you weren't stupid. You were a kid!$a"/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 3/speak Alex "You really think that?$s"/pause 500/speak Jeric "Yeah! Alex, you've gotta give yourself more credit. Be more self-confident, you know?"/pause 500/speak Alex "Most people round here think I'm too self-confident already."/pause 500/speak Jeric "Yeah, well, most people don't know jack.$a#$b#That story doesn't make me think you're stupid. It makes me think that you're kind, and hardworking, and resourceful. Focus on that.$l"/pause 500/speak Alex "Thanks.$l"/pause 1500/addConversationTopic AlexJeric6/end

Entries.955806/e 955805/t 1800 2300/d Mon Tue We: Saloon1/5 19/farmer 8 21 3 Alex 3 16 2 Jeric 4 16 2 Gus 10 17 2 Shane 1 18 1 Pam 7 18 1 Leah 2 20 1/skippable/addConversationTopic AlexJericProposal/animate Gus false true 400 18 18 19 20 20 20 19/doAction 3 16/doAction 4 16/move Jeric 0 2 3/move Alex 0 2 1/pause 400/speak Jeric "That was a great meal!$h#$b#Gus really knows his stuff."/pause 600/speak Alex "Yeah! That steak was amazing!$h#$b#I think this was a really good choice for a date night. A really special one.$l"/pause 600/stopAnimation Gus/move Gus -4 0 2/playMusic gusviolin/animate Gus false true 723 16 17/showFrame Shane 16/emote Alex 40/emote Jeric 40/faceDirection Pam 3/faceDirection Leah 0/textAboveHead Alex "Will you - "/textAboveHead Jeric "Will you - "/speak Jeric "Will you marry me?$l"/pause 300/speak Alex "Will y-$l#$b#Wait! I was going to ask you that!$a#$b#Not fair! I got Shane to film it and everything!$s"/pause 300/emote Shane 28/pause 300/speak Jeric "Yeah, well, I paid Gus to play the violin!$a"/pause 500/speak Alex "...So did I!$h"/faceDirection Alex 0/faceDirection Jeric 0/pause 300/stopAnimation Gus/stopMusic/emote Gus 60/pause 300/speak Jeric "I wondered why you didn't look surprised when he brought it out!$h"/faceDirection Jeric 3/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Jeric "Dang, and there was me thinking Shane got the camera because I was clearly being smooth.$7"/pause 500/speak Pam "So are you boys gettin' hitched or not?$1"/pause 500/speak Jeric "If you'll have me?$l"/pause 500/speak Alex "Of course!$l"/emote Jeric 20/emote Alex 20/pause 1000/end

Entries.AlexJericWeddingLetter: Dear @,^We'd like to invite you to our wedding! It will take place in Pelican Town Square, followed by a wedding reception at the Log Cabin Hotel. We hope to see you there!^Regards, Alex and Jeric.

Entries.955807/n AlexJericWeddingLetter/t 900 17: sweet/27 64/farmer 32 65 0 Alex 27 63 2 Jeric 28 63 2 Lewis 27 64 2 Haley 23 63 1 Freddie 23 65 0 Lola 24 65 0 Evelyn 25 65 0 George 26 65 0 Bryle 29 65 0 Faye 30 65 0 Philip 31 65 0 Lenny 23 66 0 Jodi 24 66 0 Kent 25 66 0 Vincent 26 66 0 Abigail 29 66 0 Sebastian 30 66 0 Sam 31 66 0 Penny 32 66 0 Richard 23 67 0 Ysabelle 24 67 0 Corine 25 67 0 Ezekiel 26 67 0 Gus 29 67 0 Pam 30 67 0 Caroline 31 67 0 Pierre 32 67 0 Robin 23 68 0 Demetrius 24 68 0 Maru 25 68 0 Harvey 26 68 0 Marnie 29 68 0 Shane 30 68 0 Jas 31 68 0 Emily 32 68 0 Kenneth 23 69 0 Ian 24 69 0 Leah 25 69 0 Elliott 26 69 0 Alissa 29 69 0 Olga 30 69 0 Bert 31 69 0 Trinnie 32 69 0/skippable/addMailReceived AlexJericMarried/addConversationTopic AlexJericMarried/showFrame Alex 48/showFrame Jeric 48/specificTemporarySprite wedding/showFrame Haley 33/pause 3000/speak Lewis "Welcome, everyone! Today we are gathered to celebrate the wedding of Jeric and Alex.#$b#These young men are such blessings for our community.#$b#Alex has always been the pride of Pelican Town for his athletic achievements, and while Jeric only moved to the valley recently he's made a big impression on all of us!#$b#I am honored to today unite them in the bonds of marriage."/animate Alex true true 3000 49 49/showFrame Jeric 49 flip/showFrame Haley 25/pause 500/faceDirection Lewis 0/move Lewis 0 1 0/playMusic none/pause 1000/showFrame Lewis 20/speak Lewis "Jeric... Entries.955808/e 955807/w sunny/t 900 1700/d Mon: springtown/53 69/farmer 48 74 3 Alex 51 71 0 Jeric 52 71 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite joshDog/pause 1000/speak Alex "Sorry, Dusty... I wish you could come and live with us, but I think it would be too much of a change for you at your age.$s"/move farmer 5 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/emote farmer 8/pause 400/faceDirection Jeric 2/faceDirection Alex 2/speak Jeric "Hey there, @! How's it goin'?"/pause 400/emote farmer 56/pause 400/speak Alex "Hey, @, how do you deal with having a pet and farm animals at the same time?"/pause 500/question null "#It took a while but my dog is used to them.#I have a cat so it's not a big issue.#Badly!#I don't have any pets.#I don't have any animals."/pause 500/speak Alex "Hmm..."/pause 500/speak Jeric "I've had an idea!$h#$b#We should go to the animal shelter in Grampleton and see if they've got any younger dogs who need a new home.#$b#I bet you could train one to look after my girls!$h"/pause 500/speak Alex "That's a great idea! Like a sheepdog, but for chickens!$h"/pause 1000/animate Jeric true true 3000 42 42/showFrame Alex 42 flip/positionOffset Alex 12 0/positionOffset Jeric -12 0/playSound dwop/specificTemporarySprite heart 52 69/pause 1000/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end
